name: Devil's Run
description:
Devil's run is a beaten em up game without the beat part. 

This time the devil doesn't want to get his hands dirty so kill his invokers with the help of the environment.

We didnt get time to make the final screen, so please after kill everyone in the dungeon, press Escape(ESC) to exit the game.

Controls:

WASD----> Movement

Spacebar,Shift, E ----> Teleport

Mouse---> Character direction

Please have fun ^^! 

PD: Lower your volume

**UPDATE**

THIS IS IMPORTANT PLEASE WE MAKE A MISTAKE WITH THE NAMES:

The exe file has this name: Devil'sRun_Jam

Please switch it for this one: GMTK_Jam

Sorry for the troubles, We are really sorry:(
